about_the_game:
This is a light turn based strategy game. Mild pigeon element, combining the characteristics of different heroes with the four seasons, and coordinating the yin and yang points brought by heroes to continuously defeat stronger enemies.

The goal of the game is to balance and improve the attack power of all seasons, with higher attacks requiring stronger combinations.

Although it is just a simple generation and placement, it requires a lot of thinking, not only about the combination between heroes, but also considering the characteristics of monsters. Clever combinations may bring unexpected results.

At the same time, it is also necessary to match the seasonal core, which varies from spring, summer, autumn to winter. Monsters also have different attack characteristics. Thus constantly pushing up the attack value and pursuing unlimited limits.

Although it is just a simple generation and placement, it requires a lot of thinking, not only about the combination between heroes, but also considering the characteristics of monsters. Clever combinations may bring unexpected results.

At the same time, it is also necessary to match the seasonal core, which varies from spring, summer, autumn to winter. Monsters also have different attack characteristics. Thus constantly pushing up the attack value and pursuing unlimited limits.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
